content:
DbParameterCollection Class

Definition

The base class for a collection of parameters relevant to a DbCommand.

In this Article

public abstract class DbParameterCollection : MarshalByRefObject, System.Collections.IList, System.Data.IDataParameterCollection
Inheritance
Object
MarshalByRefObject
DbParameterCollection
Derived
EntityParameterCollection
OdbcParameterCollection
OleDbParameterCollection
OracleParameterCollection
SqlParameterCollection

Specifies the number of items in the collection.

The number of items in the collection.

Adds the specified DbParameter object to the DbParameterCollection.

Object

Returns

The index of the DbParameter object in the collection.

AddRange(Array)

Adds an array of items with the specified values to the DbParameterCollection.

Parameters
values
Array

An array of values of type DbParameter to add to the collection.

Clear()

Removes all DbParameter values from the DbParameterCollection.

public abstract void Clear ();

Contains(Object)

Indicates whether a DbParameter with the specified stem.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value* is contained in the collection.

value
Object

Returns

Parameters
value

true if the DbParameter is in the collection; otherwise false.

The array of items to copy to the collection.

index

The index in the collection to copy the items.

GetEnumerator()

Exposes the stem.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator* method, which supports a simple iteration over a collection by a .NET Framework data provider.

public abstract System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator ();
Returns
IEnumerator

An IEnumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.

EditorBrowsableAttribute

Explicit Interface Implementations

IList.Item(Int32)

Gets or sets the element at the specified index.

object System.Collections.IList.Item[int index] { get; set; }
Parameters
index
Int32

The zero-based index of the element to get or set.

Returns
Object

The element at the specified index.

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DbParameterCollection instance is cast to an IList interface.

For more information, see Item.

IDataParameterCollection.Item(String)

Gets or sets the parameter at the specified index.

Parameters
parameterName
String

The name of the parameter to retrieve.

Returns
Object

Remarks

This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DbParameterCollection instance is cast to an IDataParameterCollection interface.

For more information, see Item.
